headline: Adobe Firefly Embeds Deeper In Enterprise Marketing Through ITG Partnership
summary: Adobe (NasdaqGS:ADBE) is integrating its Firefly generative AI into ITG's Storyteq content platform. The partnership also links Firefly with ITG's Halo Intelligence capabilities for automated content workflows. The collaboration focuses on enterprise use cases in marketing, content production, and customer engagement. For Adobe, known for its Creative Cloud and Experience Cloud lines, this move is another step in tying generative AI directly into enterprise workflows rather than leaving it...

headline: Factify Raises $73M to Build a New Intelligent Document Standard
summary: Factify, creators of the post-PDF document standard, today announced a $73M seed round to build a new foundation for documents. The round was led by Valley Capital Partners, with participation from technology and business leaders including John Giannandrea, former Head of AI at Google and SVP of AI at Apple, Ken Moelis, Founder of investment bank Moelis & Co., and Peter Brown, CEO of renowned quantitative hedge fund Renaissance Technologies.

content.title: Factify Raises $73M to Build a New Intelligent Document Standard

headline: Tauth Labs Certified as Issuer of C2PA Content Authentication Credentials Supported by the World's Leading Technology & Media Platforms
summary: Tauth Labs Inc. has been certified by the Coalition for Content Provenance and Authenticity (C2PA) as a Certificate Authority (CA) for the issuance of content authentication credentials. Supported by the world's largest technology and media companies, the C2PA content authentication standard embeds provenance into digital content so its authenticity, and changes that may have been made to it, can be verified in the AI Era.
